    def test_subtitle2speech_with_video(test_output_dir):
        """
        测试 youtube 视频字幕配音
        """
        output_speech_filepath = os.path.join(
            test_output_dir, curr_func_name() + '.mp3'
        )
        output_video_filepath = os.path.join(
            test_output_dir, curr_func_name() + '.mp4'
        )
    
        # SRT文件路径
        subtitle2speech(Assets.ted_zh_srt, output_speech_filepath)
>       api = FFmpegProHelper(

mypy/tests/lib/subtitle/test_subtitle2speech.py:51: 
_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ 

self = <mypy.lib.video.ffmpeg_pro.FFmpegProHelper object at 0x7ffacbc74d30>
input_video = '/home/runner/work/github-runner/github-runner/mypy/assets/media/ted/ted_audio.mp4'
input_audio = '/home/runner/work/github-runner/github-runner/mypy/tests/lib/subtitle/_out/test_subtitle2speech/test_subtitle2speech_with_video.mp3'

    def __init__(self, input_video, input_audio=None) -> None:
        self.video_stream = ffmpeg.input(input_video)
        # 如果没有提供 input_audio，则从视频文件中提取音频流
        if input_audio:
            self.audio_stream = ffmpeg.input(input_audio)
        else:
            self.audio_stream = self.video_stream.audio
        self.video_info = ffmpeg.probe(input_video)
        # self.video_duration = float(self.video_info['streams'][0]['duration'])
        self.video_duration = float(self.video_info['format']['duration'])
        # 获取输入视频的音视频信息
        for item in self.video_info['streams']:
            if item['codec_type'] == "video":
                self._input_video_stream_info = item
                self._input_video_width = item["width"]
                self._input_video_height = item["height"]
            if item['codec_type'] == "audio":
                self._input_audio_stream_info = item
    
        # 判断宽高比以确定屏幕方向
>       self.is_horizontal = self._input_video_width / self._input_video_height > 1
E       AttributeError: 'FFmpegProHelper' object has no attribute '_input_video_width'
